tool.name: Bigwig Files to EuPathDB
tool.description: Export a set of bigwig files to EuPathDB, to view as genome browser tracks

param.name: bigwig_files
param.label: Bigwig files:
param.help: The name of this dataset will become the name of the associated genome browser track.

validator.message: Only letters, numbers, spaces and dashes are allowed in the name.
Please restrict the name to 100 characters or less.

param.name: summary
param.label: EuPathDB dataset summary:
param.help: This summary will appear in your EuPathDB dataset listing page.

param.name: description
param.label: EuPathDB dataset description:
param.help: This description is visible on the EuPathDB dataset page reached via the dataset listing page.

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool exports one or more bigwig files to the EuPathDB website (e.g., PlasmoDB) that hosts the reference genome associated with the bigwig files. The bigwig files will be available at that site as tracks in the genome browser. The tracks will be named after the each of the bigwig files.
The bigwig files provided must all have the same reference genome.
-----
**Example**
Here is an example of a properly filled in form:
.. image:: ${static_path}/images/geneListToolDemo.png :height: 200 :width: 500
.. class:: warningmark
We recommend that the user only supply one dataset file at a time. The tool can run in batch mode, but the datasets could be very difficult to distinguish in EuPathDB as all the other parameters above will apply to every dataset.
